result.name: Cobalt

result.css:
#
# Master theme file... other properties sources
#

###
# La Jolla
###

# Header Colors
$search-text-color: #ffffff
$navpage-header-search-bg-color: transparent
$navpage-header-bg: #293e40
$navpage-header-color: #ffffff
$navpage-header-button-color: #ffffff
$navpage-header-divider-color: #5a7f71

# Left nav and navigation toolbar background color
$nav-highlight-main: #576667
$subnav-background-color: #213234
$navpage-nav-bg: #293e40
$navpage-nav-bg-sub: #293e40
$navpage-nav-color-sub: #ffffff
$navpage-nav-mod-text-hover: #ffffff
$nav-hr-color: #293e40

# Navigator tabs
$nav-highlight-bar-active: #82c9b8
$nav-highlight-bar-inactive: #213234
$navpage-nav-selected-bg: #2f4f4e
$navpage-nav-selected-color: #82c9b8
$navpage-nav-unselected-color: #d1d6d8

# Navigator Application text
$connect-latest-message: #82c9b8
$nav-timeago-header-color: #293e40
$navpage-nav-app-pill-icon-text: ${$color-white}
$navpage-nav-app-text: #ffffff
$navpage-nav-app-text-hover: #ffffff

$navpage-nav-border: #7a828a
$navpage-button-color: #ffffff
$navpage-button-color-hover: #82c9b8

$navpage-header-logo-height: 40px;
$navpage-header-logo-width: 180px;

$color-shamrock: #82c9b8
$color-shamrock-light: #b8e0d7
$color-shamrock-lighter: #82c9b8

$input-border: ${$color-light}

###
# 2018 - New La Jolla Style variables introduced
###

$color-info-light: #b5dde5
$color-info-dark: #1a424b
$color-negative-light: #ffdadc
$color-negative-dark: #64201a
$color-positive-light: #b5ebd4
$color-positive-dark: #1e4335
$color-warning-light: #fbf1b4
$color-warning-dark: #29250d

$btn-info-bg-color: ${$color-info-light}
$btn-info-bg-color-hover: ${$color-info}
$btn-info-text: ${$color-info-dark}
$btn-info-text-hover: ${$color-info-dark}
$btn-negative-bg-color: ${$color-negative-light}
$btn-negative-bg-color-hover: ${$color-negative}
$btn-negative-text: ${$color-negative-dark}
$btn-negative-text-hover: ${$color-negative-dark}
$btn-positive-bg-color: ${$color-positive-light}
$btn-positive-bg-color-hover: ${$color-positive}
$btn-positive-text: ${$color-positive-dark}
$btn-positive-text-hover: ${$color-positive-dark}
$btn-warning-bg-color: ${$color-warning-light}
$btn-warning-bg-color-hover: ${$color-warning}
$btn-warning-text: ${$color-warning-dark}
$btn-warning-text-hover: ${$color-warning-dark}
$btn-active-background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.45)
$btn-active-color: #ffffff


###
# 2014 - Style Guide
###

$color-black: #000000
$color-gray: #cfcfcf
$color-white: #ffffff

$color-purple: #7070b3
$color-purple-light: #a2a2e2
$color-purple-lighter: #c9c9ed

$color-blue: #386acf
$color-blue-light: #7497de
$color-blue-lighter: #c4d3f2

$color-aqua: #6abecf
$color-aqua-light: #a7d4df
$color-aqua-lighter: #d5ecf0

$color-cyan: #51a5ba
$color-cyan-light: #91c3dc
$color-cyan-lighter: #b8ddef

$color-green-dark: #25832b
$color-green: #48c891
$color-green-light: #84e3bc
$color-green-lighter: #b5ebd4

$color-yellow: #dfd139
$color-yellow-light: #ecdf93
$color-yellow-lighter: #f5ebc3

$color-orange: #ff8c3e
$color-orange-light: #e8a679
$color-orange-lighter: #fbd0b3

$color-red: #c83c36
$color-red-light: #fc8d8a
$color-red-lighter: #ffdadc

$color-pink: #dc143c
$color-pink-light: #ec758c
$color-pink-lighter: #fcd4dc

$color-positive: #48c891
$color-warning: #dfd139
$color-negative: #c83c36
$color-info: #6abecf

$color-primary-text: #ffffff;
$color-info-text: ${$color-info-dark}
$color-negative-text: #ffffff
$color-positive-text: ${$color-positive-dark}
$color-warning-text: ${$color-warning-dark}

$color-text: ${$color-darkest}
$color-background: #f7fafc

$color-accent: #1f8476
$color-accent-light: #5fbaa4
$color-accent-lighter: #b8e0d7
$color-accent-lightest: #eef8f8

$color-accent-accessibility: #165C53
$color-accent-light-accessibility: #54AC98
$color-accent-lighter-accessibility: #82C9B8
$color-accent-lightest-accessibility: #EEF8F8

$color-primary: ${$color-accent}

$text-color: ${$color-text}


###
#Bootstrap Defaults
###
$navbar-default-bg: #f8f8f8
$navbar-default-color: #777777
$brand-warning: #df8a13
$brand-primary: #428bca
$brand-info: #5bc0de
$jumbotron-bg-color: #428bca
$panel-bg: #ffffff

$state-success-text: ${g_darken($color-positive, 25%)}
$state-success-bg: ${g_lighten($color-green-lighter, 8%)}
$state-success-border: ${g_lighten($color-positive, 30%)}

$state-info-text: ${g_darken($color-info, 25%)}
$state-info-bg: ${g_lighten($color-blue-lighter, 8%)}
$state-info-border: ${g_lighten($color-info, 30%)}

$state-warning-text: ${g_darken($color-warning, 25%)}
$state-warning-bg: ${g_lighten($color-orange-lighter, 10%)}
$state-warning-border: ${g_lighten($color-warning, 30%)}

$state-danger-text: ${g_darken($color-negative, 25%)}
$state-danger-bg: ${g_lighten($color-red-lighter, 8%)}
$state-danger-border: ${g_lighten($color-negative, 30%)}


###
# 2014 stuff  - used in conjunction with SASS
# a few of these properties are already in the database
# table: sys_properties
###
$color-darkest: #2e2e2e
$color-darker: #4a4a4a
$color-dark: #666666
$color-light: #cbcbcb
$color-lighter: #e6e9eb
$color-lightest: #ffffff

$highlight-color: #6ab7ef
$accent-color-dark: #3e95f4
$accent-color: #6ab7ef
$accent-color-light: #bddcfc
$text-color: #485563


#
# 2005 resumes now
#
base.color: rgb(102, 153, 204)
base.text.color: white
base.background.color: white
base.border.color: black
base.font-family: SourceSansPro, "Helvetica Neue", Arial
base.font-size: 10pt
# application font size
menu.font-size: smaller

mobile.font-family: ${base.font-family}
mobile.font-size: ${base.font-size}

mobile.touch.font-family: ${base.font-family}
mobile.touch.font-size: 13pt

button.action.text.color: ${base.text.color}
button.action.background.color: ${base.color}
button.action.border.color: #666666
button.action.border.width: 1px

button.login.text.color: ${base.text.color}
button.login.background.color: ${base.color}
button.login.border.color: #666666
button.login.border.width: 1px

banner.title.color: ${base.color}
banner.description.color: #808080
text.caption.color: ${base.color}

# Banner branding styles
banner.background.attachment: scroll
banner.background.color: #FFF
banner.background.image:url("../images/s.gifx")
banner.background.position: center bottom
banner.background.repeat: repeat-x


body.background.color: ${base.background.color}

table.background.color: ${base.background.color}
table.column.head.background.color: ${base.color}
table.column.head.text.color: ${base.text.color}

button.header.text.color: ${base.text.color}
button.header.background.color: ${table.column.head.background.color}
button.header.border.color: white
button.header.border.width: 1px

label.text.color: black
label.background.color: #dddddd
label.mandatory.text.color: ${base.text.color}
label.mandatory.background.color: #cc0000
label.mandatory_populated.text.color: ${base.text.color}
label.mandatory_populated.background.color: #cc7777
label.read_only.background.color: orange
label.changed.background.color: #00cc00
label.foreign.text.color: black
label.foreign.background.color: silver
label.error.text.color: black
label.error.background.color: khaki
label.debug.text.color: black
label.debug.background.color: khaki
label.debug.success.text.color: black
label.debug.success.background.color: #99FF33
label.debug.failure.text.color: black
label.debug.failure.background.color: #FF9933

list.base.text.color: black

list.row.even.background.color: #EEEEEE
list.row.highlight.background.color: #EEE

list.row.even.text.color: ${list.base.text.color}
list.row.odd.background.color: ${base.background.color}
list.row.odd.text.color: ${list.base.text.color}
list.row.low.background.color: khaki
list.row.low.text.color: ${list.base.text.color}
list.row.medium.background.color: orange
list.row.medium.text.color: ${list.base.text.color}
list.row.high.background.color: tomato
list.row.high.text.color: ${list.base.text.color}
list.row.survey.background.color: khaki
list.row.survey.text.color: ${list.base.text.color}
list.row.list_add.text.color: ${list.base.text.color}
list.row.vertical.align: top

link.text.color: WindowText
link.column.header.color: ${base.text.color}
link.button.color: black
link.breadcrumb.color: blue
link.web.color: blue
link.navigation.link.color: blue

spellcheck.message.color: ForestGreen

banner.line.color: black

outputmsg.info.text.color: black
outputmsg.info.text.font-size: normal
outputmsg.error.text.color: black
outputmsg.error.text.font-size: normal

nav.menu.background.color: #eeeeee
nav.menu.text.color: black
nav.menu.border.color: #bbbbbb
nav.menu.border.width: 1px
nav.menu.width: 18%
nav.menu.width.right: 82%

contextmenu.background.color: menu
contextmenu.border.color: ${base.border.color}
contextmenu.border.width: 1px
contextmenu.text.color: black

slush.header.border.width: 1px
slush.header.border.color: #CCCCCC;
slush.header.border.background.color: #F0F0F0

treeview.cell.background.color: #f0f0f0
treeview.outerbody.border.width: 1px
treeview.outerbody.border.color: #D0D0D0
treeview.outerbody.background.color: #F0F0F0

filter.table.border.width: 1px
filter.table.border.color: ${base.border.color}
filter.table.background.color: #F0F0F0

report.table.background.color: #F0F0F0

olap.column.head.background.color: #dddddd
olap.column.head.text.color: black

assistant.box.border.width: 1px
assistant.box.border.color: #bbbbbb
assistant.box.background.color: #F0F0F0

nav_header.font-family: verdana, arial
nav_header.font-size: 24px
nav_header.background.color: ${base.color}
nav_header.text.color: ${base.text.color}
nav_header.margin-left: 16px

drag.section.border: #d5d5d5
drag.section.border.dark: #999999
drag.section.selected.border: #aabbdd
drag.section.dragging.border: #222222
drag.section.hilight.border: #00ff00
drag.section.hilight.neighbors.border: #ff9900
drag.section.top.background.color: #eeeeee
drag.section.header.background.color: #eeeeee
drag.section.header.active.background.color: ${$color-accent-lighter}

table.white-space: normal
table.cell.padding: 2px

input.disabled.text.color: #444444
input.disabled.background.color:#f6f6f6

input.ref_dynamic.border.color: #00CC00
input.ref_invalid.border.color: #DC143C

textsearch.kb.background.color: #f0f7f9
textsearch.catalog.background.color: #ffffdd

questionset.text.width: 250px
questionset.reference.width: 157px

user_image.max.height: 250px
user_image.max.width: 250px


# All the properties needs to be moved in a  new Table_UI_Properties file

# Tablet header and footer background
tablet.gradient.start: #666666
tablet.gradient.end: #111111

# Tablet header footer text color
tablet.headerfooter.text.color: #ffffff

script.editor.width: 80%

#mobile
m.label.color: #666
m.separator.color: #DDD
m.border-box: -moz-box-sizing: border-box; box-sizing: border-box;
m.context_menu.background: background: none repeat scroll 0 0 #FFFFFF;
m.context_menu.border: border: 1px solid darkgrey; border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); border-radius: 4px;
m.context_menu.element.font: font-weight: bold; color: #000;
m.context_menu.element.padding: padding: 5px;
m.one-line-clipped: white-space: nowrap; text-overflow: ellipsis; overflow: hidden;

m.message.background.error: #F2DEDE
m.message.error: background-color: ${m.message.background.error}; border-color: #EED3D7; color: #B94A48;
m.message.arrow.error: ${m.message.background.error}

m.message.background.info: #D9EDF7
m.message.info:  background-color: ${m.message.background.info}; border-color: #BCE8F1; color: #3A87AD;
m.message.arrow.info: ${m.message.background.info}

m.message.background.warning: #FCF8E3
m.message.warning: background-color: ${m.message.background.warning}; border-color: #FBEED5; color: #C09853;
m.message.arrow.warning: ${m.message.background.warning}

###
# Legacy variables used pre-UI16
###
form.vsplit: width:50%;
label.white.space: nowrap
result.name: La Jolla

result.css:
$accent-color-dark: RGB(var(--now-color--primary-2,23,100,82))
$accent-color-light: RGB(var(--now-color--primary-0,221,237,233))
$accent-color: RGB(var(--now-color--primary-1,30,133,109))
$brand-info: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--info-2,14,120,196))
$brand-primary: RGB(var(--now-color_brand--primary,var(--now-color--brand-1,41,62,64)))
$brand-warning: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--warning-2,210,195,0))
$btn-info-bg-color-hover: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--info-2,14,120,196))
$btn-info-bg-color: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--info-0,195,221,240))
$btn-info-text-hover: RGB(var(--now-color_text--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-18,22,27,28)))
$btn-info-text: RGB(var(--now-color_text--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-18,22,27,28)))
$btn-negative-bg-color-hover: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--critical-2,200,60,54))
$btn-negative-bg-color: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--critical-0,241,206,205))
$btn-negative-text-hover: RGB(var(--now-color_text--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-18,22,27,28)))
$btn-negative-text: RGB(var(--now-color_text--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-18,22,27,28)))
$btn-positive-bg-color-hover: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--positive-2,37,131,43))
$btn-positive-bg-color: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--positive-0,201,224,202))
$btn-positive-text-hover: RGB(var(--now-color_text--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-18,22,27,28)))
$btn-positive-text: RGB(var(--now-color_text--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-18,22,27,28)))
$btn-warning-bg-color-hover: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--warning-2,210,195,0))
$btn-warning-bg-color: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--warning-0,244,240,191))
$btn-warning-text-hover: RGB(var(--now-color_text--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-18,22,27,28)))
$btn-warning-text: RGB(var(--now-color_text--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-18,22,27,28)))
$color-accent-accessibility: RGB(var(--now-color--interactive-3,1,89,107))
$color-accent-light-accessibility: RGB(var(--now-color--interactive-2,1,119,142))
$color-accent-light: RGB(var(--now-color--interactive-1,109,177,190))
$color-accent-lighter-accessibility: RGB(var(--now-color--interactive-1,109,177,190))
$color-accent-lighter: RGB(var(--now-color--interactive-0,217,235,238))
$color-accent-lightest-accessibility: RGB(var(--now-color--interactive-0,217,235,238))
$color-accent-lightest: RGB(var(--now-color--interactive-0,217,235,238))
$color-accent: RGB(var(--now-color--interactive-2,1,119,142))
$color-aqua-light: RGB(var(--now-color_grouped--teal-1,157,202,195))
$color-aqua-lighter: RGB(var(--now-color_grouped--teal-0,210,231,227))
$color-aqua: RGB(var(--now-color_grouped--teal-2,104,174,163))
$color-background: RGB(var(--now-color_background--secondary,var(--now-color--neutral-1,246,247,247)))
$color-black: RGB(var(--now-color--neutral-21,0,0,0))
$color-blue-light: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--blue-2,128,218,235))
$color-blue-lighter: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--blue-0,206,241,247))
$color-blue: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--blue-4,49,195,223))
$color-cyan-light: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--teal-2,122,209,209))
$color-cyan-lighter: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--teal-0,204,237,237))
$color-cyan: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--teal-4,41,180,180))
$color-dark: RGB(var(--now-color--neutral-5,172,178,190))
$color-darker: RGB(var(--now-color--neutral-16,40,44,51))
$color-darkest: RGB(var(--now-color--neutral-18,24,26,31))
$color-gray: RGB(var(--now-color--neutral-3,218,221,226))
$color-green-dark: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--green-5,0,153,25))
$color-green-light: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--green-2,122,202,135))
$color-green-lighter: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--green-0,204,235,209))
$color-green: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--green-4,41,169,62))
$color-info-dark: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--info-2,14,120,196))
$color-info-light: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--info-0,195,221,240))
$color-info-text: RGB(var(--now-color_text--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-18,22,27,28)))
$color-info: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--info-1,104,171,218))
$color-light: RGB(var(--now-color--neutral-3,218,221,226))
$color-lighter: RGB(var(--now-color--neutral-2,240,241,245))
$color-lightest: RGB(var(--now-color--neutral-0,255,255,255))
$color-negative-dark: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--critical-3,160,48,43))
$color-negative-light: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--critical-0,241,206,205))
$color-negative-text: RGB(var(--now-color--neutral-0,255,255,255))
$color-negative: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--critical-2,200,60,54))
$color-orange-light: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--orange-2,255,168,147))
$color-orange-lighter: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--orange-0,255,221,214))
$color-orange: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--orange-4,238,154,99))
$color-pink-light: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--pink-2,237,135,204))
$color-pink-lighter: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--pink-0,248,209,235))
$color-pink: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--pink-4,226,61,172))
$color-positive-dark: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--positive-3,30,105,34))
$color-positive-light: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--positive-0,201,224,202))
$color-positive-text: RGB(var(--now-color_text--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-18,22,27,28)))
$color-positive: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--positive-2,37,131,43))
$color-primary-text: RGB(var(--now-color_text--primary-actionable,var(--now-color--neutral-0,255,255,255)))
$color-primary: RGB(var(--now-color--primary-1,30,133,109))
$color-purple-light: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--purple-2,174,144,236))
$color-purple-lighter: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--purple-0,224,212,248))
$color-purple: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--purple-4,124,76,225))
$color-red-light: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--red-2,238,149,179))
$color-red-lighter: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--red-0,248,214,226))
$color-red: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--red-4,227,85,132))
$color-shamrock-light: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--yellowGreen-2,209,225,133))
$color-shamrock-lighter: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--yellowGreen-0,237,244,208))
$color-shamrock: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--yellowGreen-4,181,207,58))
$color-text: RGB(var(--now-color_text--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-18,22,27,28)))
$color-warning-dark: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--warning-3,198,185,22))
$color-warning-light: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--warning-0,244,240,191))
$color-warning-text: RGB(var(--now-color_text--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-18,22,27,28)))
$color-warning: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--warning-1,227,218,96))
$color-white: RGB(var(--now-color--neutral-0,255,255,255))
$color-yellow-light: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--yellow-2,255,212,122))
$color-yellow-lighter: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--yellow-0,255,238,204))
$color-yellow: RGB(var(--now-datavis_color--yellow-4,255,185,41))
$connect-latest-message: RGB(var(--now-color--secondary-2,1,89,107))
$highlight-color: RGB(var(--now-color--primary-1,30,133,109))
$jumbotron-bg-color: RGB(var(--now-color--primary-3,15,67,55))
$nav-highlight-bar-active: RGB(var(--now-color--interactive-2,1,119,142))
$nav-highlight-bar-inactive: RGB(var(--now-color--interactive-4,1,60,71))
$nav-highlight-main: RGB(var(--now-color--neutral-10,87,95,110))
$nav-hr-color: RGB(var(--now-color_border--primary, var(--now-color--neutral-7,135,147,148)))
$nav-timeago-header-color: RGB(var(--now-color--neutral-16,40,44,51))
$navbar-default-bg: RGB(var(--now-color_background--secondary,var(--now-color--neutral-1,246,247,247)))
$navbar-default-color: RGB(var(--now-color_text--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-18,22,27,28)))
$navpage-button-color-hover: RGB(var(--now-color--interactive-1,109,177,190))
$navpage-button-color: RGB(var(--now-color--neutral-0,255,255,255))
$navpage-header-bg: RGB(var(--now-color--neutral-16,40,44,51))

m.border-box: -moz-box-sizing: border-box; box-sizing: border-box;
m.context_menu.background: background: none repeat scroll 0 0 #FFFFFF;
m.context_menu.border: border: 1px solid darkgrey; border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); border-radius: 4px;
m.context_menu.element.font: font-weight: bold; color: #000;
m.context_menu.element.padding: padding: 5px;
m.label.color: RGB(var(--now-color_text--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-18,22,27,28)))
m.message.arrow.error: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--critical-0,241,206,205))

m.message.arrow.warning: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--warning-0,244,240,191))

m.message.background.info: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--info-0,195,221,240))

m.message.info: background-color: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--info-0,195,221,240)); border-color: #BCE8F1; color: #3A87AD;
m.message.warning: background-color: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--warning-0,244,240,191)); border-color: #FBEED5; color: #C09853;
